name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 6, Huludao, Liaoning. The Green Town property has no property deeds, so the owners came to the municipal government to defend their rights, shouting "see the mayor"
November 5, Hanzhong, Shaanxi. Hangang Factory has been in arrears of pensions for ten years, and workers played the song "Socialism is Good" to defend their rights.
November 6, Xiaoyi, Shanxi. Feimao Supermarket closed down, owed money to suppliers, and suppliers held banners to defend their rights.
November 8, Handan. Huaming Coal Industry and Power Company, workers held banners to demand wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 8, Xi Jinping signed Presidential Decree No. 40, announcing the removal of Li Xiaopeng from his post as Minister of Transport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 8, Shenzhen, Guangdong. That night, a large number of urban management officers were dispatched to clean up the vendors near Jingbaina Plaza in Shajing. During the period, the snack carts of vendors were constantly confiscated. The two sides had physical conflicts and pushing, and the scene was chaotic for a while.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Cycling group in Zhengzhou on the evening of November 8

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 8, the Financial Times reported that TSMC will suspend production of its most advanced artificial intelligence chips for China.
According to three people familiar with the matter, TSMC told Chinese customers that starting next Monday, it will no longer produce artificial intelligence chips for them at 7 nanometers or more advanced process nodes.
Two of the people familiar with the matter said that TSMC will need US approval to supply any such semiconductors to Chinese customers in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 20 report: A student stabbed in a Japanese school in Shenzhen died. Police: This is an isolated case.
November 8 report: A random wounding incident occurred on Taipei Metro.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the South China Morning Post, media person Sima Nan was banned from speaking for a year.
It is reported that Sima Nan has not posted any more since he posted on November 5th to express his support for Trump's participation in the election.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 9, Guangzhou, Guangdong. South China Agricultural University. A man hung a banner on the roof and attempted to jump off the building. He said he would sacrifice his life to save the food safety of all teachers and students in the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, after Yunnan Tengchong Xinjizhou Hotel refused to check in Japanese people, netizens from all over the country sent flowers to show their support.
The slogan on the flowers read: "Strengthen our great Chinese nation, strengthen our national prestige, women are as good as men - greetings from Guangdong"
"Chinese people with backbone! Thank you - Chinese people"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, after the Yunnan Tengchong Xinjizhou Hotel refused to check in a Japanese, netizens from all over the country sent flowers to show their support. 
The slogans on the flowers read: "Strengthen our great Chinese nation, enhance our national prestige, women are as good as men - greetings from Guangdong" "Chinese people with backbone! Thank you - Chinese people"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A lamp post with "FA8964" written on it in Yuen Long, Hong Kong has always attracted attention because the number is the same as the June 4th Incident. It was closed for repairs in June last year, but it still "survived" in the end.
Recently, some citizens discovered that the lamp post number had been changed and "FA8964" disappeared. Some residents criticized that a regime is afraid of even a set of numbers, and the change will attract more attention. Everyone will remember 8964. The government explained that the change of number is for the convenience of management.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Students from many colleges and universities in Zhengzhou spontaneously organized the "Night Ride to Kaifeng" activity. Recently, many schools issued notices prohibiting students from riding to Kaifeng at night. Some schools even said that the riding team was mixed with illegal elements who spread anti-party remarks, and asked students to return immediately. On November 9, Zhengzhou and Kaifeng simultaneously announced: No riding tonight, and the shared bicycle platform also issued an announcement: In Zhengzhou, riding beyond the zone will be forced to lock the bicycle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some bloggers suspected that this night riding movement was organized and paid for by foreign forces, and the organizers should be sentenced to life imprisonment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of November 8, students from Zhengzhou rode to Kaifeng at night.
One of the students held a sign that read "The motherland must be unified and will inevitably be unified."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 9 (Release) A netizen posted that he was sent to work at Luoyang Molybdenum Co., Ltd. in Congo, Africa, in September last year. He had to work more than ten hours a day and only had one day off a week. Seven people died in ten months, and he coughed up green sputum because of working in the cobalt pile for a long time. In addition, the company pua employees and did not give sick leave.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 9, students who rode from Zhengzhou to Kaifeng at night abandoned a large number of bicycles at Daliangmen in Kaifeng, causing many people to be blocked from going to work. Some bicycles were simply thrown into the green belt beside the road.
A local netizen said that he searched for a long time yesterday but couldn't find his bicycle. In the end, he was too tired to walk, so he took a taxi home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 9, in the UK, a Chinese student posted that there was a Taiwanese boy in his class who asked him in Chinese if he wanted to attend class together. He replied in English, saying that he could not understand Mandarin, but only English. But his friends thought he was pretending not to understand, and that he was a pro-Taiwan independence supporter.
Netizens replied, "He hasn't even played with you yet, and you're criticizing him online."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: There are also schools saying online: "The department has already called, the incident has developed into a political movement, and your life is ruined if you participate" "There are anti-social people with ulterior motives, or hostile people from abroad who have joined. Think about the riots in Hong Kong back then, and you can understand why the Provincial Department of Education and the Public Security Bureau attach so much importance to it!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 9, according to social media platforms, many universities in Zhengzhou announced the closure of their campuses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Smg6ZhiYdT

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to netizens, schools in Zhengzhou, Luoyang, Jiaozuo and Kaifeng were all closed tonight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, many universities in Henan, including Henan College of Animal Husbandry and Economics and Zhengzhou University of Finance and Economics, have begun to close their campuses and prohibit students from going out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Henan Kaifeng University of Science and Technology and Media was closed. A student expressed dissatisfaction with this, saying that those who rode at night were students from Zhengzhou, so why did Kaifeng also have to close the school, causing inconvenience to many students in their travels.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 8, a large group of college students in Zhengzhou gathered under the national flag at the intersection and sang the national anthem. Kaifeng citizens lined up and waved the national flag to welcome the college students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 9, Russia's Sputnik News Agency reported: Putin's speech at the Valdai International Discussion Club meeting pointed out the direction for where the international system is going and should go.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some universities in Xi'an have also begun to control students entering and leaving the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 8, students from Zhengzhou rode to Kaifeng. One student shouted "Long live the Communist Party!" Another student waved a flag with the words "Freedom is coming!" As a result, many universities in Henan were closed the next day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/u255vrSnlE

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 8, the Security Department of the Shanxi Education Department notified all schools to check whether any students have the intention to travel to Kaifeng, Henan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 9th, full traffic control on Zhengkai Boulevard:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 8, a Russian court sentenced two soldiers to life imprisonment for the brutal murder of nine members of a family in Russian-occupied Ukraine. The two soldiers were 21-year-old Anton Sopov and 28-year-old Stanislav Rau, and the case took place in Novakh, Donetsk. Before joining the Russian army, the two were Wagner mercenaries and received state awards a few months before the murder.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Anhui University has begun screening students who have left Fei.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 8, in Henan, some Lalamove and taxi drivers took shared bicycles away and resold them, with the price ranging from 20 to 50 yuan per bicycle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 5, Shandong. A blogger said: Why do authoritarian countries strongly oppose Israel's targeted elimination plan? Because in order to enjoy their authoritarianism for a long time, they have been brainwashing the lower class, setting up a non-existent enemy, and letting the lower class charge into battle to defend and continue their authoritarianism. They use the lives of the lower class to pave the way for the privileged class to enjoy welfare, so that they can enjoy privileged power from generation to generation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Current situation of Zhengkai Avenue: All intersections are guarded by traffic police and non-motor vehicles are not allowed to enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 8, Chinese "Ele.me soldiers" who went to Russia to join the army have been complaining for days that they have endless chores to do every day, and they have to help the Russian army to clean out the manure pits.
"There is endless work to do every day, it's too tiring, I already have lung disease" "I will have to clean the manure pits later, relatives in China please don't come over"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 8, some college students took part in the cycling event, carrying a banner that read "The motherland is united, Taiwan will return to China."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just as college students in Zhengzhou were heading towards Kaifeng, college students in Nanjing began to advance towards Ma'anshan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 8, Jiangsu. A man posted a video and lamented: In the life of Chinese people, children have no childhood, teenagers have no youth, adults have no jobs, middle-aged people have no happiness, the elderly have no social security, and even dead people have no cemeteries.
The comment area was full of sighs, and netizens replied "I will never come to this place in the next life"
"They have always raised the people like pigs"
"We have no right to speak in our lives"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that Xi'an college students had previously planned to ride to Xianyang at night, but the plan was urgently stopped by the local university.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/nGtpnxDbtA

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 8, a man posted a video saying: Why is our country the most democratic country in the world, no one else, you can run for president and premier, this is possible, etc., but there was no comment on these videos.
As of now, the videos posted by the man have all been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 8, Hefei, Anhui. That night, Hefei also set off a night cycling trend, with students waving national flags and riding all the way from Hefei to Chaohu Lake.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: College students from Chengdu are heading to Dujiangyan tonight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: College students in Wuhan go to Lingbo Gate of East Lake.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 9, Hebei. A man posted a video saying that he made a living by farming. Recently, he was arrested by the police for defending his rights over land issues and was detained in a detention center in another place. During this period, he was also beaten and insulted by prison bullies. He suspected that someone had deliberately arranged it. After his mother learned about this, she suddenly had a cerebral infarction and died. The man said: As a farmer, I fought for my own land and for survival. What's wrong with me?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
College students from around Beijing started riding to Tiananmen Square at night.
(However, they need to go through border control in Beijing. At the same time, some netizens said in the early hours of last night that they were not allowed to ride bicycles through Tiananmen Square, so they had to take a bus to pass Tiananmen Square)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 8, Guangdong. A man spread a Japanese rising sun flag outside a store for passing children to step on. Not only that, he also popularized the history of the Anti-Japanese War to the children and told them that Japan is a sinister, cunning and bloodthirsty nation.
